pullrequest.title: Disable loading nested models in DART and Simbody

content.raw:
Here's what currently happens:

* `gazebo --verbose -e simbody worlds/nested_model.world`: an exception is thrown during loading
* `gazebo --verbose -e dart worlds/nested_model.world`: a seg-fault occurs during the first time-step
* `gazebo --verbose -u -e dart worlds/nested_model.world`: the world loads fine in a paused state, but crashes after stepping or unpausing

This test is paused for the duration. I've added the `world->Step(1);` to catch the dart failure.

Also, the fix in this pull request causes nested models to be ignored during loading, so `world->GetModel()` would not return anything. This is just a simple fix to keep the ship from sinking. It will take a bit more for the models to be loaded properly
content.html:
Here's what currently happens:

  • gazebo --verbose -e simbody worlds/nested_model.world: an exception is thrown during loading
  • gazebo --verbose -e dart worlds/nested_model.world: a seg-fault occurs during the first time-step
  • gazebo --verbose -u -e dart worlds/nested_model.world: the world loads fine in a paused state, but crashes after stepping or unpausing

This test is paused for the duration. I've added the world->Step(1); to catch the dart failure.

Also, the fix in this pull request causes nested models to be ignored during loading, so world->GetModel() would not return anything. This is just a simple fix to keep the ship from sinking. It will take a bit more for the models to be loaded properly
